# cribl-terraform_pack (Resource)

Pack Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cribl-terraform_pack" "my_pack" {
  id = "...my_id..."
}
```

## Schema

- `id` (String) Requires replacement if changed.

### Read-Only

- `count_test` (Number) number of items present in the items array
